price: Kisha nikawakamata walio kufuru. Basi kuchukia kwangu kulikuwaje?
arabic: ثُمَّ أَخَذۡتُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْۖ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ
footnotes: Kisha nikawashika walio kufuru kwa mshiko mkali. Basi hebu angalia kulikuwaje kuchukia kwangu kwa vitendo vyao, na ghadhabu yangu juu yao!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: thumma akhadhtu alladhīna kafarū fakayfa kāna nakīri
